role.argrole: to what? (marked by ل or إلى)

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC ضريبة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدخل))) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تزال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC متدنية)))))) (NP (PRON_3FS هي))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJP (ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_NOM اكثر) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC عدالة))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الضريبة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المضافة)))))
